mapper.select: SELECT csu.*, cs.last_message lastMessage, cs.last_receive_time lastReceiveTime, CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(contact_id, 1, 1) = 'G' THEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM user_contact uc WHERE uc.contact_id = csu.contact_id) ELSE 0 END memberCount FROM chat_session_user csu INNER JOIN chat_session cs ON cs.session_id = csu.session_id WHERE csu.user_id = ${userId};
